msbt.message: Hello, hello, and how do you do? You've reached the one and only lucky bunny, Zipper. It's true! Hippity hoppity how can I help you?

What's that? You want me to hop- hop-hop on over to your campsite?Well hippity skippity, that sounds like fun! But I'm so busy right now, I really can't. Very sorry, very sorry! You understand right? A guy like me has a lot going onHippity hoppity ho! Thanks for the invite though!
